DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to test the efficiency of intravenous administration of metoprolol versus intravenous administration of amiodarone in the prevention of atrial fibrillation after cardiac surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Metoprolol Versus Intravenous Amiodarone in the Prevention of Atrial Fibrillation After Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: elective CABG and aortic valve patients in cardiac surgery, previous use of betablocker therapy previous atrial fibrillation or flutter, thyroid disease, uncontrolled heart failure, II or III degree atrioventricular block
